mapper.insert: INSERT INTO land_report (id, projectName, assessReportNum, assessStartTime, assessEndTime, assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, reportType, branchOffice, upFileURI, landSite, landArea, landAmount, assessUnitPrice, assessTotalPrice, client, clientEmail, clientPhone, firstReporter, partReporter1, partReporter1RgNum, partReporter2, partReporter2RgNum, serviceSource, serviceCharge, checker, assessOrg,wordUri, pdfUri,firstReporterRgNum,clientAddr,quarter,pl) VALUES(#{id}, #{projectName}, #{assessReportNum}, #{assessStartTime}, #{assessEndTime}, #{assessObject}, #{valueTime}, #{assessAim}, #{assessMethod}, #{reportType}, #{branchOffice}, #{upFileURI}, #{landSite}, #{landArea}, #{landAmount}, #{assessUnitPrice},#{assessTotalPrice},#{client},#{clientEmail},#{clientPhone}, #{firstReporter}, #{partReporter1}, #{partReporter1RgNum}, #{partReporter2}, #{partReporter2RgNum},#{serviceSource}, #{serviceCharge}, #{checker},#{assessOrg} , #{wordUri},#{pdfUri},#{firstReporterRgNum} , #{clientAddr},#{quarter},#{pl});
mapper.update:
UPDATE land_report SET projectName=#{projectName}, assessReportNum=#{assessReportNum}, assessStartTime=#{assessStartTime},assessEndTime=#{assessEndTime}, assessObject=#{assessObject}, valueTime=#{valueTime}, assessAim=#{assessAim}, assessMethod=#{assessMethod},reportType=#{reportType}, branchOffice=#{branchOffice},upFileURI=#{upFileURI}, landSite=#{landSite}, landArea=#{landArea}, landAmount=#{landAmount}, assessUnitPrice=#{assessUnitPrice}, assessTotalPrice=#{assessTotalPrice}, client=#{client}, clientEmail=#{clientEmail},clientPhone=#{clientPhone}, firstReporter=#{firstReporter}, partReporter1=#{partReporter1}, partReporter1RgNum=#{partReporter1RgNum},partReporter2=#{partReporter2}, partReporter2RgNum=#{partReporter2RgNum},serviceSource=#{serviceSource}, serviceCharge=#{serviceCharge}, assessOrg=#{assessOrg},firstReporterRgNum=#{firstReporterRgNum}, clientAddr=#{clientAddr},quarter=#{quarter},pl=#{pl},
wordUri=#{wordUri},
pdfUri=#{pdfUri},
checker=#{checker},
id=#{id} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, projectName, assessReportNum, assessStartTime, assessEndTime, assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, reportType, branchOffice, upFileURI, landSite, landArea, landAmount, assessUnitPrice, assessTotalPrice, client, clientEmail, clientPhone, firstReporter, partReporter1, partReporter1RgNum, partReporter2, partReporter2RgNum, serviceSource, serviceCharge, checker, assessOrg,wordUri,pdfUri,firstReporterRgNum, clientAddr,quarter,pl FROM land_report where id=#{id}
